description:
Robson is from the east coast. It's not hard to tell, as he has a very New York way about him. He's very no-nonsense and likes to get right down to business.
He's very, very straight so I doubt we'll be seeing him in any guy-on-guy on stuff, but you never know. He does love to get head, especially if he can nut in his partner's mouth.
title: Robson
